description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle-X is a game inspired by some of the great fighting games of the 2D era of sprite based combat.  It features 1-4 player battles fought in multi-platform levels.  Featuring 11 characters, each with their own abilities, stories and endings, this game will keep you coming for more.  Eight levels of selectable difficulty allows for this game to be enjoyed by all ages and skill levels alike.
